column6: The madness continues as Venom and his squad of monstrous heroes wage all-out war on the SPIDER-QUEEN. To reclaim a Manhattan completely overrun by the Queen's spider-army, Venom'll need a little help from his friend. Which friend? We'll give you a hint: Thwip!
column8: | writer:Christos Gage | artist:Paco Diaz Luque | penciller (cover):Humberto Ramos
